member.name: IShellItemResources.CreateResource
member.param: A reference to a desired IID.
The address of a pointer to the resource.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources.EnumResources
member.param: The address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources.GetAttributes

param.name: pdwAttributes
param.para: A pointer to resource attributes. The following are attribute values.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources.GetResourceDescription
member.param: A pointer to a resource description as a Unicode string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources.GetSize
member.param: A pointer to the source size.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources.GetTimes
member.param: A pointer to the creation date and time as a structure.
A pointer to write date and time as a structure.
A pointer to access date and time as a structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources.OpenResource
member.param: A reference to a desired IID.
The address of a pointer to a resource.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources.SetTimes
member.param: A pointer to a creation date and time as a structure.

A pointer to an access date and time as a structure.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources.SupportsResource
member.summary: Retrieves whether an item supports a specified resource.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellItemResources
member.summary: Exposes methods to manipulate and query Shell item resources.
